summary: Changes the powers on the Konahrik mask.
descriptionHtml:
Created a new script to add all the other 8 mask powers,and removed the original enchantment.It\'ll run fine with Skyrim,no DLCs needed,but works with Hearthfires and Dawngaurd installed.Haven\'t tested with Dragonborn,but should be ok.I mainly created it for me,but thoguht someone else might have preferred the other enchantments in one.I may modify it later to remove other masks one recieved,or have it lock masks if you take the Konahrik one,so oyu can\'t take em with you.

To install just put UltimateDragonPriestMask.esp in your Data folder,and enable in the launcher under Data Files.
To uninstall,just unmark it in the Data Files,and delete the UltimateDragonPriestMask.esp.
author: Belial666
